titleStmt.title: To the right high and mightie prince, Iames by the grace of God, King of great Britannie, France, and Irelande, defender of the faith, &c. An humble supplication for toleration and libertie to enioy and observe the ordinances of Christ Iesus in th'administration of his churches in lieu of humane constitutions.
titleStmt.author: Jacob, Henry, 1563-1624.

titleStmt.title: To the right high and mightie prince, Iames by the grace of God, King of great Britannie, France, and Irelande, defender of the faith, &c. An humble supplication for toleration and libertie to enioy and observe the ordinances of Christ Iesus in th'administration of his churches in lieu of humane constitutions.
titleStmt.author: Jacob, Henry, 1563-1624.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Running title reads: An humble supplication to His Maiestie.
This printing has an erratum at the foot of p. 48.
The copy of this item at reel 2340:8d is fourth in a group of ten items bound and filmed together.
Imperfect: copy at reel 2340:8d is damaged, with loss of print on last leaf.
Reproductions of the originals in: British Library (reel 993:10) and Boston Public Library (reel 2340:8d).
